game.title: The Goblin King's Wrath
game.objective: Find and vanquish the Goblin King
game.description: You have been tasked with finding the lair of the Goblin King and putting an end to his reign of terror.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and the Sword of Eternity

task.description: Follow the trail of the Goblin's destruction in the dark forest and discover the entrance to the king's lair.
Engage in combat with the Goblin King and defeat him, thus ending the terror he has spread across the kingdom.
